app.title: Sprite Service
app.subtitle: Upload an image or generate from text to create game sprites

upload.splitModeAutoDesc: AI background removal with automatic element detection
upload.splitModeGridDesc: Split by grid lines, suitable for sprite sheets

generate.uploadReference: Upload an image to use as reference
generate.promptPlaceholder: A fantasy knight sprite, pixel art style, transparent background, facing right...
generate.editPlaceholder: Make it a zombie version, add glowing eyes, change the armor to dark color...

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls randomness in generation. Lower values (0) produce more consistent, predictable results; higher values (2) produce more varied, creative results.

distanceThreshold.label: Merge Distance
distanceThreshold.description: Maximum distance (pixels) between elements to merge them. Larger values combine more scattered elements into a single sprite.

sizeRatioThreshold.label: Size Ratio Threshold
sizeRatioThreshold.description: Minimum size ratio of elements compared to the largest element. Elements smaller than this ratio will be filtered out.

alphaThreshold.label: Alpha Threshold
alphaThreshold.description: Threshold for alpha channel binarization. Used to determine if a pixel is transparent.

minAreaRatio.label: Min Area Ratio
minAreaRatio.description: Minimum area ratio of an element compared to total image area. Very small elements will be ignored.

maxAreaRatio.label: Max Area Ratio
maxAreaRatio.description: Maximum area ratio of an element compared to total image area. Very large elements (possibly background) will be ignored.

autoDetect.label: Auto Detect
autoDetect.description: Automatically detect grid lines in the image. When disabled, you must specify rows and columns manually.

gridRows.label: Rows
gridRows.description: Number of rows in the grid. Only used when auto detect is disabled.

gridCols.label: Columns
gridCols.description: Number of columns in the grid. Only used when auto detect is disabled.

gridPadding.label: Inner Padding
gridPadding.description: Inner padding (pixels) when cropping cells, used to remove grid line edges.

lineThreshold.label: Line Threshold
lineThreshold.description: Hough line detection threshold. Lower values detect more lines.

minLineLengthRatio.label: Min Line Length Ratio
minLineLengthRatio.description: Minimum line length as a ratio of image width/height to be detected.

outputSizes.title: Custom Output Sizes
outputSizes.description: Enable to customize output sprite sizes. Default outputs Large (256), Medium (128), Small (64).

info.title: How it works
info.textToImage: Your text description will be used to generate an image using AI. The generated image will automatically go through background removal, sprite splitting, and multi-size output.
info.imageToImage: Upload a reference image and describe how to modify it. The AI will generate a new image based on your instructions, then automatically process it through background removal, sprite splitting, and multi-size output.
